title: Los Sabios
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Chinese, Buffet, Salad bar, Take-out, Asian
description: Busy restaurant. Offers hot and cold buffet food for dine-in or take away. Use their containers or bring your own. Slightly cheaper price at weekday lunchtime. In the hot food and dessert sections, only half the food is vegan (lots of ricotta and egg ingredients). Cold/salad section is mostly vegan. Nearest subte station is Medrano.
